attributes.action: Stop the the former Broke Hill Golf Course Halstead being given up for housing.
attributes.additional_details:
Here is further background on the story.

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/www.kentlive.news/news/kent-news/council-confirms-sevenoaks-golf-club-770983.amp

Once this site has gone it will change the area forever. There is no infrastructure in the area to cope with these potential plans.
attributes.background: The site of the former golf course at Broke Hill is situated within the green belt. This site maybe at the extreme edge of Sevenoaks council control geographically but this is no excuse. The green belt exists for a reason. A massive housing development there is unacceptable. Sevenoaks please say no.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
